entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as a 'funny man' who intentionally taught Harry enough to help him face Voldemort. He is also mentioned as knowing more or less everything that goes on here.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as someone who has a chance to face Voldemort if he can use the Mirror.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as saying that Dumbledore is 'barking' and is proud of Harry's abilities.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being upset about the situation with Voldemort and is worried about Harry's safety.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as busting over to attend to someone.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as the main antagonist and is mentioned as someone that Harry has a chance to face if he can use the Mirror.

relationships.description: Dumbledore helped Harry by teaching him enough to help him face Voldemort.
Voldemort is the opponent that Harry has a chance to face if he can use the Mirror.
